channel.description: Recent content in power8 on Technical Computing Goulash

item.title: IBM Software Defined Infrastructure: Put the POWER down and jump the chasm!
item.description: OpenPOWER continues to put the power down and accelerate strongly in 2015. Earlier this year, the First Annual OpenPOWER Summit took place and more recently Cabot Partners published the paper Crossing the Performance Chasm with OpenPOWER, outlining the benefits of OpenPOWER for HPC.
